title: All The Possibilities
description: Petunia: Never DespairShelby Campbell's father, a promising politician, had been assassinated years before. Since then, Shelby avoided politics entirely. Then she met persistent, persuasive Alan MacGregorâ€”and the stubborn Scot was a senator! How could she resist a man who courted her with rainbows...and whose passion proved that anything was possible?
author: Nora Roberts
